thothbot.parallax.core.shared.core

Class UV

  • java.lang.Object
    • thothbot.parallax.core.shared.core.UV

  • public class UV
extends java.lang.Object
    Class implements UV texture mapping.

    UV texturing permits polygons that make up a 3D object to be painted with color from an image.

    Here are:

    • U - Horizontal coordinate.
    • V - Vertical coordinate.
    UV coordinates should be applied per face. not per vertex. This means a shared vertex can have different UV coordinates in each of its triangles, so adjacent triangles can be cut apart and positioned on different areas of the texture map. 
     UV uv = new UV( 0, 1 );
    Author:
    thothbot

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UV()
      This default Constructor will make UV object (0.0, 0.0)
      UV(double u, double v)
      This constructor will initializes (U, V) texture mapping.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UV clone()
      Clone the current UV mapping object.
      UV copy(UV uv)
      Copy values of UV mapping object to the values of the current UV mapping object.
      double getU()
      get Horizontal coordinate.
      double getV()
      get Vertical coordinate.
      UV lerp(UV uv, double alpha)
      Linearly interpolates between the current UV object and input UV object.
      UV set(double u, double v)
      Sets the value of this UV from the two coordinates (U, V).
      java.lang.String toString()
      Return information about this UV mapping object as list of Horizontal and Vertical coordinates.
